name: Storyset by Freepik
description:
Cool illustrations to power up your project!

Storyset is the latest creation from Freepik, one of the main references in the free graphic resources market. Thousands of illustrated concepts, with editable colors and backgrounds, are available for download. All of them come in different styles, and can be animated too with the online editor. Visit Stories by Freepik and get started!


This plugin allows you to search for illustrations from Storyset database and insert them directly into your project. You can choose the style of the illustration, its global color and what kind of background you want to have. All in a few clicks!


Instructions:

1. Run the Storyset plugin.

2. Use the search bar to find an illustrated concept.

3. Filter the results by style and then choose the desired color and background.

4. Click the illustration to add it to your project and start editing!
